Title: Sandook
Writer: Atul Kale, Subodh Khanolkar, Ashish Raikar
Actors: Vidyadhar Bhave, Bhargavi Chirmuley, Rahul Gore, J. Brandon Hill
Plot: Sandook is a Marathi movie starring Sumeet Raghvan and Bharagavi Chirmuley in lead roles. it is a satirical comic thriller set in pre independence era in a small town. The main protagonist ...
